title: Poster, ca. 1919
signed: Imprinted in black in lower margin, center:  D. PECHE
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of George A. Hearn
description: Surface divided roughly into thirds.  Upper and lower third are book end images of each other consisting of plant with three flowers growing from central stem and with long, slim, sharply-pointed leaves on branches. On either side of central images, five rows of black and white diamond pattern. In central third of field, zig-zag pattern in black and white surrounding an empty bow-shaped field inside of which appears "Spitzen der Wiener Werkstätte." Upper and lower edges of image are "pinked" as in textile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1919.
ca. 1919. Lithograph on off-white paper. Museum purchase through gift of George A. Hearn. 2002-19-1.
